sections.title: 1. Data Controller
sections.content: Multiversity Labs Co., Ltd., Business Registration No. 123-45-67890, with offices in Seoul, is responsible for the application.

sections.title: 2. No Data Collection
sections.content: We do not collect, store, or process any personal data from our users. No account creation is required to use our services.

sections.title: 3. Data Retention
sections.content: Since we do not collect any personal data, there is no data to retain or transfer. All application state is stored locally on your device.

sections.title: 4. Your Rights
sections.content: As we do not hold any of your personal data, there is no information to request access to, correct, or delete.
